PCL Library  version 5.11
provides all the needed APIs to control your Ingenico device (iSMP, iSMP Companion and iCMP)
  • Main Page
  • Modules
  • Data Structures

Modules
Here is a list of all modules:
[detail level 12]
AdministrationAll methods, structures and callbacks of ICAdministration class
Companion ConfigurationCompanion Configuration Functions
Companion Power Management ConfigurationSet of functions to control the power management of the Companion
ICAdministration InitializationSteps in order to initialize the ICAdministration object
Performing TransactionsAll methods and structures necessary to perform a transaction on the Companion
Performing printingAll methods and structures necessary to perform text or bitmap printing on the Bluetooth Printer paired with the Companion. A printing session must already be opened before calling all these methods, otherwise the call returns immediately with a failure value
Printing over the Administration ChannelPrint receipts composed of text and bitmaps from the Companion on the iDevice applications
Communicate using TCP/IP protocolThis category involves all required methods and data structures to communicate with a Companion using TCP/IP
Companion Connection StateCheck and get notified about connection changes between the iDevice and Companion
Companion InformationAll software and hardware information about the Companion
Native PrintingAll classes and protocols provided by the PCL library to emulate a printer
ICPrinter CallbacksAll Printing Notifications
ICPrinter InitializationSteps in order to initialize an ICPrinter object
NetworkingAll networking classes and protocols provided by the PCL library
ICNetwork InitializationSteps to initialize the ICNetwork object
Network NotificationsNotifications of network connection changes
PCL Library VersionMethods to retrieve information about the library version, must not be used (will be deprecated in the future)
Scanner ManagementThis category involves all required methods and data structures to control the Companion scanner
Barcode Scanner Configuration CallbacksAll callbacks that are related to the scanner's configuration
Barcode ScanningAll methods provided by ICBarCodeReader to perform software scanning of barcodes
Barcode Scanning CallbacksAll callbacks related to scanning and decoding barcodes
Companion Scanner ConfigurationConfiguration functions of the Companion scanner
ICBarCodeReader InitializationSteps to initialize ICBarCodeReader object
Scanner InformationMethods to retrieve information about the scanner
Scanner Power ManagementPower management functions of the Companion scanner
Trace LoggingAll trace routines provided by the PCL library
ICAdministration Trace Logging
ICBarCodeReader Trace LoggingTrace Logging callbacks for ICBarCodeReader class
